reviews.text: Excellent service from Dr Seow and his team. Very patient and calm dentist, helps to make the whole process a lot less stressful. Also the friendly front office lady is ever so helpful and cheerful! Highly recommended all my family and friends.

The dentist dr Jeffrey KB Seow is ever so personable and friendly. He puts the patient and ease as he patiently explained in the wisdom tooth extraction process. The whole surgery was over in a twinkling of an eye üëÅÔ∏è and the experience was pleasant and speedy. Thank you Dr Jeffrey! 6 ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏èü¶∑ü¶∑üòÉ

Dr Seow is a very honest, patient and kind doctor.  He was able to offer an accurate diagnosis of my dental problem.  He treated my gum infection successfully.

As such, I didn't need to spend $3000 plus dollars for a root canal treatment as advised by another dentist at Q and M.

Thank you, Dr Seow.

I am impressed by the thorough and efficient care I received. Dr Amanda is very professional and friendly. My polishing was done meticulously and made for a pleasant, comfortable experience. I have been keen to have my teeth whitened and finally got it done after Dr Amanda's efforts in concisely explaining the process and benefits of clinic vs home whitening. The OPG XR was also obtained very quickly during the consult, which allowed me to get on with my day asap. An excellent experience altogether thanks to the wonderful staff!

Great place! Great dentist and Lily is so professional handling all the enquiries‚Ä¶
